I'm improving the Col Dean Hartley Website, specifically the page on the 19=
64 Barnsdall Sword Show put on by the Nanka Token Kai (http://home.comcast.=
net/~colhartley/Oriental/ArmsAndArmor.htm).  I am looking for additional ph=
otos of the exhibit itself (the catalog pictures are already on the page). =
 Fred Martin and Bob Haynes just about killed themselves putting on a fanta=
stic show and I want it to remain possible for those who weren't there to e=
njoy it.
